CustomField.formula: (EPLI_Class_Of_Business_Factor__c + EPLI_Number_of_Years_In_Business_Factor__c + EPLI_Location_Factor__c + EPLI_Prior_Yr_Employee_Turnover_Factor__c + EPLI_M_A_Activity_Prior_2_Yrs_Factor__c + EPLI_At_Will_Statement_Factor__c + EPLI_Employee_Handbook_Factor__c + EPLI_Annual_Performance_Reviews_Factor__c + EPLI_Harassment_Training_Factor__c + EPLI_Full_Time_HR_Pro_Factor__c + EPLI_Profitability_Factor__c + EPLI_Debt_to_Equity_Factor__c + EPLI_Prior_Claims_Activity_Factor__c + EPLI_3rd_Party_Exposure_Factor__c + EPLI_Immigration_Violation_Factor__c + EPLI_Wage_Hour_Factor__c)/16
CustomField.label: EPLI Rating Factor
